title: Meet Info
cleaned_text: The New Balance Indoor Grand Prix will be held on February 4, 2023 at the [the TRACK at new balance](https://thetrackatnewbalance.com), the brand-new, state-of-the-art indoor track and field complex located across the street from New Balance's world headquarters in Brighton, Mass. As of November 2022, there are no COVID-19 restrictions of any kind in force by the City of Boston or the Commonwealth of Massachusetts. Tickets for the 2023 New Balance Indoor Grand Prix can be purchased by calling or more are eligible for a 15% discount (no other discounts may be applied with a group discount). Information regarding media credential applications can be found [here](https://www.nbindoorgrandprix.com/meet-info/media-info/). For specific media inquiries, please email . The 2023 New Balance Indoor Grand Prix will be shown live on NBC from 4:00PM to 6:00PM EST on Saturday, February 4. For any other questions, please feel free to email or call us at 1-877-849-8722, ext. 0.
